message.name: ERR_ISSUETIMECON_RV_CANCELLED
message.locale: Issue time constraint has been canceled already.
Issue time constraint has been cancelled already.

message.name: ERR_ISSUETIMECON_FV_NUMDAYS_ENTERED
message.locale: Number of Days must be entered.

message.name: ERR_ISSUETIMECON_FV_FROMDATE_TODAY
message.locale: From date must be on or after today.

message.name: ERR_ISSUETIMECON_RV_CANCELLED_MODIFY
message.locale: Issue time constraint cannot be modified as it is has been canceled already.
Issue time constraint cannot be modified as it is has been cancelled already.

message.name: ERR_ISSUETIMECON_XRV_OVERLAP_TYPE
message.locale: A time constraint type must not overlap with an existing time constraint of the same type.
